title: Finally, the blog is here!
content: We have a version of the blog that I find pleasing; now we have all the pages and compatibility with mobile browsers is 100%.

title: I finally bought the Juno skin.
content: Yesterday I bought the Hello Kitty Juno skin, I thought it was amazing. I even finished my placement matches with Juno and reached Gold 2.

title: Play of the Game with the new support
content: Yesterday's I played it's magnificent play, I had the new Jetpack Cat support, I really liked it, but you need to know how to position yourself very well as a support (which I already know LMAO).

title: The Beautiful play with my friends
content: Yesterday's play was magnificent, my friends and I were playing (Marcelo even recorded it, thank you Marcelo!). I was playing support with Wuyang and it was a fantastic play.

title: I'm excited for the Hello Kitty skins on OW2
content: I really liked the skin of Juno and Windowaker, I don't now what I will take. But the Juno skin it's soo cutee :3 I think to take the Juno skin!

title: We are in Vercel!
content: Officially my idea it is online on the internet :) I am very happy, and can't wait to post more things here :3

title: First post here
content: This website is made by me, Pedro Menino. I create this website, to remember the good old blogs, i never lived then phase but i really like the idea
